Text:
hero of sparta is the only game that has sd files in sdcard/gameloft/hos
in other words copy hos folder to sdcard/gameloft, not gameloft/games !!!
if the gameloft folder or the gameloft/games folder does not exist, created yourself

for hero of sparta (AND ONLY FOR HOS) copy hos folder to sdcard/gameloft, DO NOT COPY to sdcard/gamelof/games
if a folder does not exist (ex: sdcard/gameloft) create it yourself
skies of glory installs only through adb install

if a games fails to work invert steps 1 and 2 (be sure to uninstall the game and delete all the files of the game from sd card (files always remain on sd card after uninstall) and only then proceed with  the install. always be aware of step 3 on a first run!
